name: Auri
description:
'''Auri''' is a Finnish [[progressive folk]] band composed of vocalist and violinist [[Johanna Kurkela]], keyboardist [[Tuomas Holopainen]] (her husband), and guitarist and pipe player [[Troy Donockley]]. Holopainen and Donockley are also members of the band [[Nightwish]]. Their self-titled first album, ''[[Auri (album)|Auri]]'', was released on March 23, 2018. and was recorded at [[Peter Gabriel]]'s [[Real World Studios]].

Holopainen described Auri's style as "rabbit hole music and celestial metal" with "influences from [[folk music]], [[Celtic music]], [and] [[soundtrack]]s". British rock magazine [[Prog (magazine)|''Prog'']] describes the band as [[Progressive folk|prog folk]]. The band's name is based on a female character from ''[[The Kingkiller Chronicle]]''.
